FuncDef:
The resource command adds a resource item to a resource template and specifies the upper limit for the resource item.
The undo resource command deletes a resource item from a resource template.
By default, a newly created resource template contains no resource item.

ParaDef.Info:

The value is an integer.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To add a resource item to a resource template and specify the upper limit for the resource item, run the resource command. After the configuration is complete, the PS uses the resource template to assign resources to a VS in a batch, improving VS resource management flexibility.
Follow-up Procedure
After the resource template is assigned to the VS, modify the resource items in the template. Modifying a resource item in a resource template does not affect the resources that have been used.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
